forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub are all open from 9:00 â€“ 4:00 today, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through today. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list. The lodge will be closed on Sunday, November 29th. Stay tuned for an announcement on an opening day to the ski season.
